pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible and Robust GARCH-X Modelling // Flexible and robust estimation and inference of generalised autoregressive conditional heteroscedasticity (GARCH) models with covariates based on the results by Francq and Thieu (2018) doi:10.1017/S0266466617000512. Suitable subsets of the coefficients can be restricted to zero during estimation, and quasi maximum likelihood methods ensure estimates are generally consistent, even when the standardised innovations are non- normal and/or not independent and identically distributed.
